member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.NLogTarget.ApplicationInsightsTarget
member.summary: NLog Target that routes all logging output to the Application Insights logging framework. The messages will be read by the Microsoft Monitoring Agent (MMA) which uploads logging message to the Application Insights cloud service.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.NLogTarget.ApplicationInsightsTarget.InitializeTarget
member.summary: Initializes the Target and perform ComponentId validation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.NLogTarget.ApplicationInsightsTarget.Write(NLog.LogEventInfo)
member.summary: Send the log message to Application Insights.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.NLogTarget.ApplicationInsightsTarget.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.param: True if called from user code, false if called from finalizer.

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.NLogTarget.ApplicationInsightsTarget.ComponentId
member.summary: The Application Insights ComponentId for your application.
